com.solidfire.element.api

Class LdapConfiguration

  • Object
    • LdapConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class LdapConfiguration
extends Object
implements Serializable
    LDAP Configuration object returns information about the LDAP configuration on SolidFire storage. LDAP information is returned with the API method GetLdapConfiguration.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      LDAP Configuration object returns information about the LDAP configuration on SolidFire storage.

      The base DN of the tree to start the group search (will do a subtree search from here).
      String getGroupSearchCustomFilter()
      The custom search filter used.
      String getGroupSearchType()
      Controls the default group search filter used, can be one of the following:
      NoGroups: No group support.
      ActiveDirectory: Nested membership of all of a user's AD groups.
      MemberDN: MemberDN style groups (single-level).
      String getSearchBindDN()
      A fully qualified DN to log in with to perform an LDAP search for the user (needs read access to the LDAP directory).
      String[] getServerURIs()
      A comma-separated list of LDAP server URIs (examples: "ldap://1.2.3.4" and ldaps://1.2.3.4:123")

      A string that is used to form a fully qualified user DN.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LdapConfiguration

        @Since(value="7.0")
public LdapConfiguration(String authType,
                       Boolean enabled,
                       String groupSearchBaseDN,
                       String groupSearchCustomFilter,
                       String groupSearchType,
                       String searchBindDN,
                       String[] serverURIs,
                       String userDNTemplate,
                       String userSearchBaseDN,
                       String userSearchFilter)
        LDAP Configuration object returns information about the LDAP configuration on SolidFire storage. LDAP information is returned with the API method GetLdapConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        authType - [required] Identifies which user authentcation method will be used.
        enabled - [required] Identifies whether or not the system is enabled for LDAP.
        groupSearchBaseDN - [required] The base DN of the tree to start the group search (will do a subtree search from here).
        groupSearchCustomFilter - [required] The custom search filter used.
        groupSearchType - [required] Controls the default group search filter used, can be one of the following:
        searchBindDN - [required] A fully qualified DN to log in with to perform an LDAP search for the user (needs read access to the LDAP directory).
        serverURIs - [required] A comma-separated list of LDAP server URIs (examples: "ldap://1.2.3.4" and ldaps://1.2.3.4:123")
        userDNTemplate - [required] A string that is used to form a fully qualified user DN.
        userSearchBaseDN - [required] The base DN of the tree used to start the search (will do a subtree search from here).
        userSearchFilter - [required] The LDAP filter used.
        Since:
        7.0

        public String getGroupSearchType()
        Controls the default group search filter used, can be one of the following:
        NoGroups: No group support.
        ActiveDirectory: Nested membership of all of a user's AD groups.
        MemberDN: MemberDN style groups (single-level).

      • getSearchBindDN

        public String getSearchBindDN()
        A fully qualified DN to log in with to perform an LDAP search for the user (needs read access to the LDAP directory).
